Doodle (Doodle/Doodle)
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher 1 Archive (PSOne): CD List: Doodle: Doodle (Doodle/Doodle)
By Lisa Shock on Wednesday, February 18, 2009 - 09:22 am:

The Damned
Damned, Damned, Damned

1989 Pressing, the cover just says "DAMNED" in large yellow letters behind a photo of the band -whose members appear to have been hit by cream pies.

the spine says:

"31033-2 THE DAMNED Damned Damned Damned Frontier"

Barcode: 0 1866-31033-2 7

The back of the case has:
12 tracks "Made to be played loud at low volume"

After track 12 it says:

(P in a circle)1977 Stiff Records Ltd/Fanpack Ltd
©1987 Demon Records Ltd

The Frontier logo is on the lower left of the back, the Demon logo is on the lower right of the back. Between them is the following text:

"(P in a circle)1989 Demon Records Ltd/ ©1989 Frontier Records *P.O. 22 * Sun Valley * CA
91353 * Distributed in the U.S.A. exclusively by the REP Company * Issued under
license from Demon Records Ltd * All rights reserved


On the CD itself, 4621-2-L is on the left next to the Frontier logo. On the right, the info from the bottom of the back of the case is repeated along with a notation that the CD was manufactured and distributed by BMG, with BMG's copyright notice.


Doodle

Lif 121
Pow 120
Def 97
Ski 101
Spd 120
Int 128

Starts with: Stiletto, Head Butt, Whip

The Shrine guy says:

"What the heck? Someone scribbled this monster. What a rare, loser geek! You're lucky, I guess."
